original_title: The Perfect Sacrifice: When Heaven Comes To Earth
overview: This is a story of faith of four diverse people: A priest, an popular entertainer, a Catholic evangelist with a healing ministry and a religious Sister. In a chaotic world filled with confusion and pain, people are searching for answers. They find the answers through the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass; for at this moment Eternity reaches into the present and Heaven literally comes to Earth.
title: The Perfect Sacrifice: When Heaven Comes To Earth
